name: Neon Dream Flamingo
description:
Thank you for taking the time to look at my game, Neon Dream Flamingo.

This game plays much like Flappy Bird, except that you can run on surfaces, and you collect little gems.

To play, if you are on PC, just press the space bar or left click to flap. On the phone you can tap anywhere on the screen to get the flamingo to flap. See how far you can go!

Please give the game a try and let me know what you think! My best run I got for my final playtest before release was 57 gems.

Credits

I used Kenney's UI prompts for the control prompts that show in the beginning. Slightly modified to fit the color palette.

For the background music I used DOS-88's free-to-use music.

jeti makes all kinds of creative bitmap fonts, so I used the Digital Disco and Lychee Soda fonts they made.

For the cover image title I used Darrell Flood's Neon Vampire font.

The game was made on the Godot 3.5.1 Engine.
